Record.Term: Mouse Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen Plasmid DNA Vaccine
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/DNA Vaccine/Mouse Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen Plasmid DNA Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Mouse Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen Plasmid DNA Vaccine
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: Mouse Prostate-Specific Membrane Antigen Plasmid DNA Vaccine
Record.Description: A vaccine consisting of a plasmid DNA encoding the murine prostate-specific membrane antigen (PSMA). Upon administration, expressed PSMA may stimulate a cytotoxic T cell response against tumor cells that express PSMA, resulting in tumor cell lysis. (NCI05)
